detectors.description: Variable RainFinance._totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RainFinance.sol#67) is not in mixedCase
RainFinance.owner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RainFinance.sol#65) is never used in RainFinance (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RainFinance.sol#56-153)

totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- RainFinance.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RainFinance.sol#74-76)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- RainFinance.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RainFinance.sol#78-80)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- RainFinance.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RainFinance.sol#82-84)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- RainFinance.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RainFinance.sol#104-109)
